alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 08 at 8:35AM CST until January 12 at 1:22AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallahala Creek at Laurel. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Water begins to cover Old Sandersville Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Monday the stage was 0.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 16.0 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Tallahala Creek Laurel 13.0 0.7 Mon 7 am CST 12.7 15.5 13.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM CST.
